Package branch

Class BranchDirectory

java.lang.Object
branch.BranchDirectory
public class BranchDirectory extends Object
Represents an overall directory of branches.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BranchDirectory getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of this BranchDirectory.
      Returns:
      this BranchDirectory's singleton instance.

    • getBranchDirectory

      public ArrayList<Branch> getBranchDirectory()
      Gets the arraylist of branches in this BranchDirectory.
      Returns:
      This BranchDirectory's arraylist of branches.

    • getBranchByName

      public Branch getBranchByName(String name)
      Gets a branch from this BranchDirectory based on Branch name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the branch.
      Returns:
      The branch with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • displayBranches

      public void displayBranches()
      Prints out the available branches in this BranchDirectory in an indexed manner.

    • getBranchByUserInput

      public Branch getBranchByUserInput()
      Gets the branch selected by the user. Displays a list of branches and prompts the user to select one.
      Returns:
      The selected branch.

    • addBranch

      public void addBranch(Branch branch)
      Adds a new branch to this BranchDirectory. Writes the updated BranchDirectory information into branch_list.xlsx.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch to add.

    • rmvBranch

      public void rmvBranch(Branch branchToRmv)
      Removes a branch from the branch directory. Removes all staff and menu items associated with the branch. Writes the updated information to the relevant spreadsheets.
      Parameters:
      branchToRmv - The branch to remove.
